title: Replace a Cockpit Windshield
description: A maintenance crew needs to replace a cockpit windshield that was damaged by a bird strike.

tasks.description: Remove the damaged windshield and its sealant according to the Structural Repair Manual (SRM).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the SRM procedure to safely remove the old windshield.

tasks.description: Install the new windshield, apply new sealant, and allow it to cure for the specified time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly installs the new windshield.

tasks.description: Perform a cabin pressurization leak check to ensure the new windshield is properly sealed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the leak check and confirms there are no leaks.
